com.nokia.mid.ui

Class DirectUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nokia.mid.ui.DirectUtils

  • public class DirectUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    The DirectUtils class provides utility methods for creating images and obtaining DirectGraphics objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      DirectUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static Image createImage(int width, int height, int ARGBcolor)
      Creates an image with the specified width, height, and ARGB color.
      static DirectGraphics getDirectGraphics(Graphics g)
      Returns a DirectGraphics object associated with the specified Graphics object.

      • createImage

        public static Image createImage(int width,
                                int height,
                                int ARGBcolor)
        Creates an image with the specified width, height, and ARGB color.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the image
        height - the height of the image
        ARGBcolor - the ARGB color of the image
        Returns:
        the created Image object

      • getDirectGraphics

        public static DirectGraphics getDirectGraphics(Graphics g)
        Returns a DirectGraphics object associated with the specified Graphics object.
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics object to associate with the DirectGraphics object
        Returns:
        the DirectGraphics object
